name: Forsaken Woods (itch)
description:
Forsaken Woods is a fast Paced BulledHell Platformer Boss Rush Game, where you have to fight bosses dodging multiple projectiles and aiming you attacks. It's a extremely challenging game, that also rate your combat perfomance.

Features:

- BulletHell / Shoot 'em up Inspired Game;
- Platformer;
- Powerfull enemies to Hunt;
- 40+ Attack Patterns;
- Grade/Score System;
- Arcade mode;
- Leaderboard;
- Achievements;
